table-entry.name: steel
table-entry.col-data: ID INTEGER NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1, INCREMENT BY 1) primary key,BUILDNAME VARCHAR(200),OWNER VARCHAR(200),TIME VARCHAR(200),NORMS VARCHAR(100),RENTERTYPE VARCHAR(100),NUM DECIMAL(12,8),UNITPRICE DECIMAL(12,8)

table-entry.name: fastening
table-entry.col-data: ID INTEGER NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1, INCREMENT BY 1) primary key,BUILDNAME VARCHAR(200),OWNER VARCHAR(200),TIME VARCHAR(200),NORMS VARCHAR(100),RENTERTYPE VARCHAR(100),UNITPRICE DECIMAL(12,8)

table-entry.name: building
table-entry.col-data: ID INTEGER NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1, INCREMENT BY 1) primary key,BUILDNAME VARCHAR(200),OWNER VARCHAR(200),phone VARCHAR(100),addr VARCHAR(300),TIME VARCHAR(200)

table-entry.name: fastening_norm
table-entry.col-data: ID INTEGER NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1, INCREMENT BY 1) primary key,name VARCHAR(200),description VARCHAR(200),TIME VARCHAR(200)
